divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my backyard, looking up at the sky. Suddenly, across the sky a round object moved northwest to southeast. it was above the clouds but could be plainly seen. it was not moving at a high rate of speed but it knew where it was going. i don't know how high the clouds were but it was just a touch above them. the object moved in an exact line with no wavering. the sighting lasted less then fifteen seconds. my feelings were that i had just seen a ufo. i went into the house and then came out again. i thought that if i saw one, i might see another one, but that was not to be. I am 63 years of age, this is the first ufo i have ever seen. i would be interested if there are any reports from kalamazoo or points southeast of plainwell that might have seen this object.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Plainwell
There were no other sightings in Plainwell on or around May 14th 2008
Summary: circle of light, no sound, moving from northwest to southeast, not at a high rate of speed, but with purpose.
